description: Aaron Michael Services provides expert installation of slip-resistant and low-pile flooring for homes and businesses. Serving Buffalo, Kenmore, Tonawanda, North Tonawanda, and Cheektowaga.

areaServed.name: Buffalo, Kenmore, Tonawanda, North Tonawanda, Cheektowaga

itemOffered.name: Vinyl Flooring
itemOffered.description: Low-pile, slip-resistant vinyl flooring for residential and commercial use.

itemOffered.name: Rubber Flooring
itemOffered.description: Durable, low-pile rubber flooring with natural slip resistance.

itemOffered.name: Low-Pile Carpet
itemOffered.description: Commercial-grade low-pile carpet suitable for wheelchairs, walkers, and high-traffic areas.

itemOffered.name: Ceramic and Porcelain Tile
itemOffered.description: Slip-resistant, low-pile tiles with textured finishes for safety in kitchens and bathrooms.

itemOffered.name: Engineered Hardwood
itemOffered.description: Low-pile engineered hardwood with anti-slip finishes for residential safety.

itemOffered.name: Luxury Vinyl Tile (LVT)
itemOffered.description: Durable, low-pile LVT with textured surfaces for slip resistance and aesthetic appeal.
